page.title: 05CURLEY PARK RANGERS
page.content:
{ C.P.R football club}has been around since{1973.}The chairman of C.P.R is Ron Dyer,the secretary Terry Law and the treasurer Ken Johnson.There are 8 teams altogether ranging from under 9's to under 17's.
The name 'Curley' came from the hill {'High Curley'}near the 'Country Park'. C.P.R have different grounds in Bagshot and Lightwater.You stay until you are 17,then you go to a different club. You must not have more than 17 boys in the squad because there will be too many in a team and they would not all be able to play.I play for the under 12's.
The teams normally play on Sunday in the Bracknell Aerospace League.
{
